chunk:
Wild Carrot Herbals Rosehip & Raspberry Serum

Brand: Wild Carrot Herbals

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIP) SEED OIL*, RUBUS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) SEED OIL, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL* (AND) SAMBUCUS NIGRA (ELDER) FLOWER* EXTRACT, TOCOPHEROL, ROSA DAMASCENA (ROSE) OIL, SANTALUM ALBUM (SANDALWOOD) OIL.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
